title: The Asset Allocator: The Allocation I Recommend To My Children
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: I tell my kids to aspire to an asset allocation equal-weighted among stocks, real estate and cash. This podcast (5:36) argues that you don't attain wealth without ownership of risk-based assets such as real estate and stocks. But you don't preserve that wealth from the blows that time and chance deliver without a large dose of liquidity. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:summary:
I tell my kids to aspire to an asset allocation equal-weighted among stocks, real estate and cash. This podcast (5:36) argues that you don't attain wealth without ownership of risk-based assets such as real estate and stocks. But you don't preserve that wealth from the blows that time and chance deliver without a large dose of liquidity.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
